speaker_turns.text: Have you seen the forecast for this weekend?
Yes, they're saying it might snow on Saturday.
Really? I was planning to go hiking then.
You might want to reschedule. They're predicting several inches.
Thanks for letting me know. I'll make other plans.
I noticed an unauthorized transaction on my credit card
I'll help you with that. Can you verify the last four digits of your card?
Yes, it's 4582
Which transaction are you disputing?
The $129.99 charge from Digital Store yesterday
